Name: Coal Root
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring or summer. Takes 10 days to mature.
SeedPurchaseRequirements: z summer, z fall, z winter

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plantalas en primavera. Toma 10 dias para madurar
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen Sie diese im Frühjahr oder Sommer. Die Reifezeit beträgt 10 Tage.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plantez-les au printemps ou en été. Prend 10 jours pour mûrir.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ültesse ezeket tavasszal vagy nyáron. 10 napig érlelni.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Piantali in primavera o in estate. Ci vogliono 10 giorni per maturare.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: これらを春または夏に植えます。 成熟するのに10日かかります。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera ou no verão. Leva 10 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной или летом. Вырастает через 10 дней..
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Bunları ilkbahar veya yaz aylarında dikin. Olgunlaşması 10 gün sürer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天或夏天播种。10天成熟。
